<div infinite-scroll-distance="50" infinite-scroll-disabled="disabledInfiniteScroll"><div class="content"><div data-v-55f98c8b="" class="fav-value-tip-wrap fav-value-tip-wrap-contribute" style="display: none;"><img data-v-55f98c8b="" src="//s1.shuidichou.com/cf/static/img/di-3.7ff0164.png"> <span data-v-55f98c8b="" class="content">爱心值代表你在平台的爱心贡献度，爱心值越高，你的爱心等级越高。转发、捐款、帮患者证明，这些爱心行为都可以收获爱心值哟。</span> <span data-v-55f98c8b="" class="arrow"></span></div> <div class="left"><img src="http://thirdwx.qlogo.cn/mmopen/vi_32/e5Qjy0PF1NoP1jpRHr7k3MbXnicNfiad1gG0F9sGY1UxZKxSCMlEBQ5PqWa7BBnINLy5uw5UeOuZH7NRH1CuUSkw/132" class="img-head"></div> <div class="right"><div class="div-top"><p class="p-help-deco"><span class="nickname">
